Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: JKM DB2 400 Simple (Journal) COMPONENT VERSION: 10.1.3.3 AUTHOR: Oracle COMPATIBILITY: 10.1.3.5.0 and above
DESCRIPTION - Journalizing Knowledge Module - This JKM provides simple journalizing procedures on Iseries tables - The following objects are created: - Subscribers central table - Journal table - procedure CDCRTVJRN to retreive data from journal - Views for selecting data
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option)
LIMITATIONS - Please read the CDC documentation for iSeries before using this KM. - CDCRTVJRN program must be installed in the default work library of your data server.
Alter subscribers table for V3 comp

alter table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> add ( JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, JRN_DATA_CMD <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null, JRN_COUNT_CMD <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%> null )

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connect to the Source Database ie the one that hosts the journalized tables myCon = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= odiRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>

create table <%=odiRef.getTable( "L", "SUBSCRIBER_TABLE", "A" )%> ( JRN_TNAME VARCHAR(150) not null, /* Qualified Name of table we are listening to */ JRN_SUBSCRIBER VARCHAR(50) not null, /* Name of the subscriber */ JRN_JNAME VARCHAR(150) not null, /* Qualified Name of the J$ table */ JRN_KEY_COL_LST VARCHAR(256) not null, /* Comma separated list of the PK of JRN_TNAME*/ JRN_REFDATE TIMESTAMP, /* Backward Compatibility */ JRN_CURFROMDATE TIMESTAMP not null, /* Current From Date */ JRN_NXTFROMDATE TIMESTAMP, /* Next From Date */ JRN_ROW_COUNT NUMERIC(10), /* Number of Rows (for SnpWaitForLog API) */ JRN_DATA_CMD <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "2000")%>, constraint <%=odiRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L","PK_SNP_JRN_SBS","W")%> primary key (JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER) )

create procedure <%=odiRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L","CDCRTVJRN","W")%> ( SbsTName char(138), /* Qualified name of the Subscribers table */ JrnTName char(138), /* Qualified name of the source table we are listening to */ JrnSubscriber char(50), /* Current Subscriber Name */ LogMessages char(1) /* Create a debug spool file (Y - Yes, N - No) */ ) language rpgle external name '<?=odiRef.getObjectNameDefaultPSchema("L","CDCRTVJRN","W").replace('.', '/')?>'

insCmd = """ insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_REFDATE, JRN_CURFROMDATE, JRN_KEY_COL_LST, JRN_JNAME, JRN_ROW_COUNT, JRN_DATA_CMD ) values ( /* JRN_TNAME */ '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* JRN_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* JRN_REFDATE */ current timestamp, /* JRN_CURFROMDATE*/ CURRENT TIMESTAMP, /*JRN_KEY_COL_LST*/ '<%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",", "", "PK")%>', /*JRN_JNAME*/ '<%=odiRef.getTable( "L", "JRN_NAME", "A" )%>', /* JRN_ROW_COUNT */ 0, /* JRN_DATA_CMD */ null ) """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd)
# Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate()
prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

create table <%=odiRef.getTable( "L", "JRN_NAME", "A" )%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER varchar(50) not null, JRN_CONSUMED varchar(1), JRN_FLAG varchar(1), JRN_DATE timestamp, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME] [DEST_CRE_DT]", ",\n", "", "(PK)")%> )

create view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select distinct CASE WHEN (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "char(TARG.[COL_NAME])", " || ", "", "PK")%> IS NULL) THEN 'D' ELSE 'I' END JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME] [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "JRN_NAME", "A")%> JRN left outer join <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> TARG on ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME] = TARG.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "PK")%> ) where JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select MAX(X.JRN_DATE) from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "JRN_NAME", "A")%> X where X.JRN_CONSUMED = '1' and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME] = X.[COL_NAME]", "
and		", "", "PK")%> )

create view <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_DATA_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select distinct CASE WHEN (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "char(TARG.[COL_NAME])", " || ", "", "PK")%> IS NULL) THEN 'D' ELSE 'I' END JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME] [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "JRN_NAME", "A")%> JRN left outer join <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> TARG on ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME] = TARG.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "PK")%> ) where JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select MAX(X.JRN_DATE) from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "JRN_NAME", "A")%> X where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME] = X.[COL_NAME]", "
and		", "", "PK")%> )

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit updates myCon.commit()

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()
